reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much nicer than expected
reviews.reviewText: The shelf is made of wood and is off-white. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. We are using it as a tv stand for a small guest room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finish Imperfect, Still Good-Looking
reviews.reviewText: As others have noted, the "walnut" color leans hard toward the red end, while not quite making it to "cherry", but I wanted that. There are also, as noted, a lot of finger-joints in the otherwise-solid wood shelves, but those types of joints are very strong and you don't see them once there's stuff on the shelves, plus it's more environmentally responsible and economical to not have to use big spans of clear wood. The finish/gloss isn't super even on the shelves, but it's easy to pick a better side and arrange the main shelves to see the best parts. Assembly was pretty straightforward, although the holes on the top shelf weren't as easy to align as on the other shelves, but getting all of those screws started and then incrementally tightening around and around got it done. The screw cover pegs just needed a little persuasion with a hammer to go into the holes (but use something in between to protect the peg finish). Once assembled, with the very long screws, the shelf is both relatively light and very sturdy - we have bottles of olive oil and balsamic vinegar loaded on one shelf and lots of cookbooks on two others, and it's been fine for the few weeks we've had the shelf. My biggest concerns were a strong wood finish smell right out of the box that dissipated quickly, and lots of vaguely-concerning small sparkly fibers that got everywhere when unboxing and assembling, but a damp-rag wipedown and vacuum of the area seemed to address those. This is an attractive addition to my kitchen that I expect to serve well for many years. And, bonus, the open back allows me to still access a light switch on the wall we wanted to put the shelf on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid real wood
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful piece! The wood is real, not the normal cardboard stuff that furniture is made from now. The directions were clear and concise, I went from unboxing to loading my new bookshelf in less than 30 mins....I recommend it so much, I will likely be buying an additional piece for my office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our needs.
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together but would recommend constructing the very top shelf and setting aside before adding the other shelves to the side rails. We did not notice but there definitely is a top and under side to the shelves; there is a beveled edge and the recessed bevel is the on underside which becomes more obvious during the instruction's last assembly step, which is to attach the top shelf to the 2 rails, that can can only be done one way, bevel down. We were going to leave the other shelves alone because I guarantee we would have been the only people to notice but the finish on on the actual topside of the shelves was smoother. But we took the advice of other reviewers and did not tighten the screws until everything was assembled so it just took a few minutes to reverse the shelves.There was damage to one of the side pieces but there was no external damage to the packaging. The thing that is not obvious in the product photos on Amazon is that the some of the wood slats are very soft, almost like a thick balsa wood. The break was in one of the "X" brace slats on the side, wood glue fixed it in no time flat; not worth boxing up, shipping back, and the repair is almost undetectable.I agree that for the price, this is much better looking than pressed wood bookcases that can be as or more expensive. Our needs were specific to the width because it needed to fit into a wall niche and after researching a long time over a few days, there were no other 5 shelf bookcases with decent height that were this narrow. It was perfect for our space. That made it worth the price. That said, the quality and weight of the wood, without the value of our need, would have made it seem overpriced as a stand alone bookcase.I loved that there were wall braces included. Any light-weight bookcase of this height needs to be braced if there are small children around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t know what to expect for the low cost but was pleasantly surprised to find a really nice, sturdy piece of furniture. Easy to assemble. Love it so much trying to figure out where I could put another. Great deal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shelves!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased several of these little bookshelves after a recent cross country move where I had to let go of much taller heavier shelving units. They each took me less than five minutes to put together (using a drill) and I really like them! I’d recommend a rubber mallet to get the wood caps in flush (carefully tap to prevent cracking or blemishes in the wood), and keep an eye out that the tapered edges are pointed the correct way on each shelf. Please note if you’ve purchased similar looking shelves from World Market or other furniture stores these are not the same, as they are lighter in weight, and lower in quality, in my opinion. I’ve included a pic of my brown World Market shelf next to one of these for comparison. I noticed a few minor paint blemishes on these as some others mentioned, along with fiber strands inside the packaging materials, so please use caution while unpacking. I’ve included pics that will hopefully help others looking to get these. When the box is standing on end with the name up like in the pic it’s the easiest and fastest way to access the instructions and screw set without having to open all of the packaging which helps reduce styrofoam and fibers getting everywhere. These little shelves have worked great for me and I’m happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice small bookshelf. Easy to put together and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has safety brackets -great for playrooms! Nice for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is perfect for a playroom or kid’s bedroom/nursery. Having a sense of safety should be important and this shelf definitely helps with the reinforcement brackets. The color is pure white. The look is modern. All parts were there. Easy to assemble: Took 20 mins with power drill. One person can assemble. The shelf can hold plenty of things and would probably be fitting for a small home office. I don’t love the shelf, I like it. It’s functional & tall enough to serve more purpose than just looks. Quality is contingent with price. I’d recommend this to anyone looking for a quick way to clear up clutter. Great baby shower gift! 5 shelves for items. This shelf is over 5 ft tall!! It’s about 64 inches tall =5’4” I hope this helps!

reviews.reviewerName: Family of Five Family of Five
reviews.reviewText: I've been shopping for a lot of furniture lately as we just moved, and this piece stands out as a really good price for the quality. It's solid wood, sturdy, pretty and was the perfect size for our space. I also thought the wood covers for the screws are a quality detail. If you don't like the wood grain showing faintly through the paint, just add another coat, but personally, I love it. We used it in our laundry room, but I'd gladly buy again for a bedroom, entryway, or living room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful and easy to build but missing 1 small piece.
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful but missing a part. Super easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely, solid wood bookcase. Sturdy and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: We're very pleased with this bookcase. It is made of real wood, has a beautiful, deep rich color and it has a nice weight and sturdiness.The assembly instructions were clear and my daughter was able to put it together in less than an hour with the tools provided.I diligently checked several sites when shopping for this item, and Amazon beat the lowest price on those sites by over $30.A nice item for the price and it blends in beautifully with my other (more expensive) sitting room furniture.

I am so happy with this book case. It was so easy to assemble and it’s solid material makes it very sturdy. And considering I have a lot of hard cover books, this is a huge bonus. It’s also quite stylish too. Although I personally didn’t assemble it, I watched the person doing it and it was put together in less than 15 minutes. I believe that there is an option to anchor it to a wall for additional stability which I think is a great idea! This is a great lower budget option.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Looks nicer than I expected for the price. Bought it as shelving for my home office but ended up using it in my living room because it was too cute to be filled with files.
